snippet: Sam Madison, who helped the Giants win a Super Bowl while mentoring a young secondary, is no longer playing, but he is at training camp with the next generation of students.
abstract: Sam Madison, retired Pro-Bowl cornerback who helped New York Giants win a Super Bowl while mentoring a young secondary, returns to team's training camp to help groom a new generation of defensive backs.
lead_paragraph: Sam Madison, who helped the Giants win a Super Bowl while mentoring a young secondary, is no longer playing, but he is at training camp with the next generation of students.

headline.main: Madison Returns to Giants, but Don’t Call Him ‘Coach’
headline.print_headline: Mentor Returns to Giants, but Don’t Call Him ‘Coach’
